text: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddhavīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati
edit: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddhavīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati

translations.transtext: I which occasion, monks, when the perseverance got started, [and] the monk's rapture without defilement arises, in that occasion the monk's rapture-factor of enlightenment gets started. In that occasion, the monk cultivates the rapture-factor of the enlightenment. In that occasion, the monk's rapture-factor of the enlightenment becomes fully developed.
